article_title: SNL’s Weekend Update Piles on ‘Idiot’ Ben Carson
article_text:
SNL‘s Weekend Update piled on Dr. Ben Carson tonight for his comments about how prisons show being gay is a choice, because some people go in straight and come out gay.

Like, as Michael Che put it, how “in that last sentence, Dr. Ben Carson went in as a neurosurgeon and came out as a complete idiot.”

But they didn’t stop there. Che and Colin Jost continued ripping into Carson, remarking that 1) voting against Carson is also a choice, and 2) Carson’s presidential ambitions are pretty much dead in the water.

Watch the video below, via NBC:

Please enable Javascript to watch.

[image via screengrab]
